title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: When accessing the library outline view, it is not possible to select any item for the first time.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to a library file.
2. Access the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item.
OB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the selection does not register.
EB: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the selection should register and the item should be highlighted.
SR:
1. Add a label to a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item.
